evidence.claim: Concourse Global leverages AWS for its cloud infrastructure.
The platform complies with HIPAA standards for data privacy and security.
Concourse utilizes Snowflake for data management and analytics.
They implement HL7 standards for healthcare data interoperability.
Integration with EHRs is facilitated via FHIR APIs.

icp.icp_reason: Lacks specific evidence of X12 transaction handling or clearinghouse services.
